commentList.translatedContent: It's really good. I've been to Hanting twice. The room is very clean and the bathroom is very good. It's really convenient for the machine to be delivered to the door of the room. The traffic is also very convenient. distance
commentList.content: 真心不錯，漢庭來過兩次，房間很乾凈，浴室也很好，機器送到房間門外真的很方便，交通也挺方便，從三里屯過去，在公交車站不到2分鐘的距離

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments. We will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly. Our small courtyard can park and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. , the hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

commentList.translatedContent: It was a very happy trip, the food and accommodation were good, the place I lived was very close to the mountain, so I didn’t have to drive, and I could go out for a walk at night. The chef’s food was so good that I got fat. Overall, I was very satisfied with the trip?
commentList.content: 很開心的一次旅行，吃住都不錯，住的地方離上山很近省去了開車，晚上還可以出來走走，廚師的菜不錯都吃胖了，總體來説很滿意的旅行？

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客: 您好！非常感謝您對酒店的支持和各方面的認可，我們所做的一切都衹為 每一位賓客帶來不一樣的度假體驗，看到您的滿意和肯定，我們真的是非常的感動，我們會繼續努力時刻準備着您隨時回來。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear Guest: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and recognition of the hotel. Everything we do is to bring a different holiday experience to every guest. We are really touched by your satisfaction and affirmation. We Will keep working hard and always be ready for you to come back anytime.

commentList.translatedContent: After waiting for the robot to deliver the food for 30 minutes, I didn’t deliver it, and kept waiting, or the front desk just said not to deliver it, and went to the front desk to pick it up. The robot was still there and there was no food delivery at all. The room, as a result, a room with a wall blocking more than half of the window is really speechless. I spent more than 300 living in this room.
commentList.content: 等機器人送餐等了三十分鐘還不給送，還繼續讓等，要不前台就直接説不給送，去前台自已取，機器人還在那個位置，根本沒送餐，訂的帶窗的房間，結果給一間牆擋一大半窗的房間，真無語，花三百多住這樣的。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的貴賓，您好很抱歉給您這次入住帶來不好的體驗，在此由衷的對您説聲抱歉 您的意見我們已經內部員工加強了服務培訓及管理，期待您下次入住能看到我們的改變，期待您的下次光臨
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, I am sorry to bring you a bad experience during your stay. I would like to sincerely say sorry for your comments. We have strengthened service training and management for our internal staff. We look forward to seeing you next time you stay Our change, looking forward to your next visit

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel lobby gives people a very comfortable feeling as soon as you enter the door. It is the best lobby in so many Hanting hotels I have stayed in. The service from the little sister at the front desk is very good. The hotel breakfast is very rich and delicious, and the room is also very clean. It is far away from Chaoyang, Beijing. The station is very close. If I didn't know there is such a good Hanting when I went home this time, I would live in this Hanting in the future.
commentList.content: 一進門酒店大堂就給人很舒服的感覺，是我住過這麼多家漢庭最好的大堂了 前台小妹妹服務非常棒，酒店早餐很豐盛美味，房間打掃的也挺乾淨的，離北京朝陽站很近，要不是這次回家還不知道有這麼好的漢庭 以後就住這家漢庭了

feedbackList.content: 非常感謝在眾多酒店中選到漢庭，感謝您對酒店的支持和認可，酒店目前新增了早餐特色，機器人也可以送餐到房間哦，酒店有免費洗衣房，期待您下次入住哦
feedbackList.translateContent: Thank you very much for choosing Hanting among many hotels. Thank you for your support and recognition of the hotel. commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Station. The starting price is just a taxi ride away. During the epidemic, the hotel was disinfected very well. There is an automatic temperature measurement when entering the door. There is still a big TV in the room. It is very safe and secure to live in. Will stay here again in the future continue to choose this hotel
commentList.content: 酒店離新開的北京朝陽站很近，打個車起步價就到了，酒店疫情期間消毒做的挺好的，進門有自動測温的，房間裏還是大電視，住的很安全放心，以後還會繼續選擇這家酒店

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，感謝您入住北京朝陽公園橋東店並給予好評，酒店屬於漢庭2.7版本，產品很新，乾淨衞生，距離朝陽大悦城很近，裏面可以購物和吃飯都很方便，距離附近新開的朝陽火車站僅有800米，酒店還有有免費停車場和洗衣房，非常方便，希望本酒店能成為您在北京的首選，熱誠期待您的再次光臨！
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving a good review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The hotel also has a free parking lot and a laundry room, which is very convenient. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your coming again!

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving a good review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast at the hotel is very rich and healthy, with vegetables and fruits, soy milk, porridge, fried rice, toast, suitable for all kinds of needs. It's very convenient to eat around. As soon as you go out, there is a big Yali restaurant, and there is a Japanese restaurant around the corner, Wan Fengting. The price is moderate, and the dishes are rich and delicious. A little further away is a KFC and a Pizza Hut, both within walking distance. The hotel is not facing the street, very quiet, suitable for college students to rest here.
commentList.content: 酒店早餐很豐盛，健康，有蔬菜有水果，豆漿，粥，炒飯，烤麪包，適合各類需求。周邊吃飯很方便，一出門挨着一家大鴨梨，拐個彎有一家日本餐廳，晚楓亭，價格適中，菜品豐富，口味很好。再遠一點有一家肯德基，一家必勝客，都是走路距離。酒店不臨街，很安靜，適合高考生在此休息。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的貴賓，您好，感謝您對我們工作的支持和肯定，咱們酒店七點到十點有自助中西自助早餐，非常豐富美味，還有自煮小混沌和各種北京小吃，酒店裡還有免費洗衣房和停車場，距離朝陽火車站僅800米，非常方便，酒店熱烈期待貴賓的再次光臨！
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your support and affirmation of our work. Our hotel has a buffet Chinese and Western buffet breakfast from 7:00 to 10:00, which is very rich and delicious. There are also self-cooked small chaos and various Beijing snacks. The laundry room and parking lot are only 800 meters away from Chaoyang Railway Station, which is very convenient. The hotel warmly looks forward to the visit of distinguished guests again!
